frontmatter.title: Using CloudWatch Metrics with AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry
frontmatter.description: To support OpenTelemetry Metrics in Amazon CloudWatch. CloudWatch team contributed AWS EMF Exporter for OpenTelemetry Collector as part of AWS OpenTelemetry that converts OpenTelemetry format metrics to CloudWatch Embedded Metric Format It enables customer applications integrating OpenTelemetry metrics with CloudWatch and has ability to send high-cardinality application metrics which is well supported by EMF. In this tutorial, we will walk through how to enable CloudWatch metrics in the ADOT Collector.
